item.title: More Pregnancies With Weight Loss Before IVF
item.description: The studies reviewed were small and heterogeneous and it is unclear which interventions were the most successful. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Diabetes Device Access Gaps Common, Affect Management
item.description: Early device failures, prior authorizations, and not receiving 90-days’ worth of supplies contribute to the problem. Medscape Medical News
